content.raw:
I also ran into the `UNIT_SDF_TEST.exe` linking error. The patch below fixes the problem for me

~~~
diff -r 1fe715d1c91a cmake/SDFUtils.cmake
--- a/cmake/SDFUtils.cmake      Tue Jun 23 11:44:17 2015 -0700
+++ b/cmake/SDFUtils.cmake      Thu Jun 25 13:06:23 2015 -0700
@@ -158,6 +158,7 @@
         gtest_main.lib
         sdformat.dll
         ${IGNITION-MATH_LIBRARIES}
+        ${Boost_LIBRARIES}
       )
     endif()
~~~

I also ran into the UNIT_SDF_TEST.exe linking error. The patch below fixes the problem for me

diff -r 1fe715d1c91a cmake/SDFUtils.cmake
--- a/cmake/SDFUtils.cmake      Tue Jun 23 11:44:17 2015 -0700
+++ b/cmake/SDFUtils.cmake      Thu Jun 25 13:06:23 2015 -0700
@@ -158,6 +158,7 @@
         gtest_main.lib
         sdformat.dll
         ${IGNITION-MATH_LIBRARIES}
+        ${Boost_LIBRARIES}
       )
     endif()
